name: Grains Of Time
description:
Summary

Grains of Time is a Dungeon Crawler Resource Management game about exploring through a tower before the sand swallows it up. As you explore new rooms, destroy furniture to gather materials to board up doors and slow the sand.

Will you make it out alive (yes you can win)

Game made for Ludum Dare 51

Controls:

Controller (Xbox + PS gamepads, others should work):

  • (A/Cross) Open Door 
  • (X/Square) Destroy Furniture & Boards / Board Doors
  • (Left Analog Stick) Movement 

Keyboard:

  • (E) Open Door 
  • (Spacebar) Destroy Furniture & Boards / Board Doors
  • (WASD) Movement 
Credits
  • Art: Chris & Celeste Sinclair
  • Programming: Ryan Armstrong
